title: Best of The Program | Guests: Jedediah Bila & Robert Unanue | 11/17/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss some of the "fact-checks" of the Rittenhouse trial. Author and former co-host of "The View" Jedediah Bila joins to discuss her latest appearance on "The View," where she clashed with the hosts over her vaccination status and her new book, “Dear Hartley.” Robert Unanue, president and CEO of Goya Foods, joins to discuss how inflation has impacted his business.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
